## NS.tprint() method

Prints a value or a variable to the Terminal.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tprint(msg: any): void;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description          |
| --------- | ---- | -------------------- |
| msg       | any  | Value to be printed. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
